trans-unit.source: Represents a file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a Web services discovery document.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> class is employed by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> method, which handles an HTTP request for a discovery document.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> trabalha na classe de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler> da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryRequestHandler.ProcessRequest%2A> método, que manipula uma solicitação HTTP para um documento de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> class's <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> property contains a collection of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> instances.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument> da classe <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DynamicDiscoveryDocument.ExcludePaths%2A> propriedade contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo> instâncias.

trans-unit.source: Normally, none of these classes need to be used directly by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, nenhuma dessas classes precisa ser usada diretamente por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo" /> class.
The path to exclude from searches.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo" /> class and specifies the file system path to exclude from searches.
The value of the `path` parameter becomes the return value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da `path` parâmetro torna-se o valor de retorno de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ExcludePathInfo.Path%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the file system directory path that should not be searched for references to add to a discovery document.
The file system directory path that should be excluded from searches.
trans-unit.target: O caminho de diretório de sistema de arquivo que deve ser excluído da pesquisa.
